overview: Hollywood Hulk Hogan battles The Ultimate Warrior. Goldberg defends the WCW World Heavyweight Championship against "Diamond" Dallas Page. Bret Hart defends the United States Championship against Sting. The Outsiders go to war when Scott Hall faces Kevin Nash. Brothers face off when Rick Steiner battles Scott Steiner and much more!
tagline: The Night When Good Battles Evil.
title: WCW Halloween Havoc 1998
